title: Role of Model Size and Prompting Strategies in Extracting Labels from Free-Text Radiology Reports with Open-Source Large Language Models
details: B Khosravi, T Dapamede, F Li, Z Chisango, A Bikmal… - Journal of Imaging …, 2025
abstract: Extracting accurate labels from radiology reports is essential for training medical image analysis models. Large language models (LLMs) show promise for automating this process. The purpose of this study is to evaluate how model size and …

title: Machine Learning to Predict the Onset of Ventilator-associated Pneumonia Using Electronic Health Record Data
details: A Peltekian, K Senkow, NS Markov, M Kang… - American Journal of …, 2025
abstract: Background: Ventilator-associated pneumonia (VAP) is one of the deadliest hospital- acquired infections, with a mortality rate ranging from 25-70%. Currently, clinical models to predict VAP development are limited. Development of such a model would …
